summary: REQ-2 is implemented via a new Next button on ReplyPage and state-based navigation in App to a new FarewellPage. REQ-1 is mostly implemented (click-to-edit, focus, saving via useReplyPersistence.save, disabled/loading while saving, exit edit mode), but the Save button is only rendered while editing rather than being always present at the bottom of the reply box. REQ-3 is mostly implemented (new FarewellPage, exact-looking message, kissing emoji overlay hidden after 5 seconds), but the rendered message may not be exactly identical due to the missing leading space shown in the requirementâ€™s quoted text. Several unrequested visual/theme changes and footer branding were also added.

missing_requirements.requirement: A Save button is rendered at the bottom/end of the reply box container (visually attached to the reply box section).
missing_requirements.reason: In the diff, the Save button is conditionally rendered only when `isEditing` is true; the requirement/AC indicates the Save button should be rendered at the bottom/end of the reply box (not only during edit mode).

missing_requirements.requirement: The fourth page renders the provided parting message exactly as given (including punctuation and emojis).
missing_requirements.reason: The requirement shows the message string starting with a leading space after the opening quote (" Bye ..."), but the FarewellPage renders it without that leading space ("Bye ..."). This may violate the 'exactly as given' constraint.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a new branded footer on the new Farewell page with a dynamic year, a lucide Heart icon, and an external caffeine.ai link.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-3 only asked for the exact parting message and a 5-second kissing animation; it did not request new branding, icons, or external links.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced broad Valentine's-themed global styling changes (OKLCH theme tokens, gradients, multiple animations beyond the 5-second kissing animation).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only required ReplyPage edit/save/next behavior and a 5-second kissing animation on the new page; global theme/animation expansions were not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified/extended Tailwind configuration with custom fonts, shadows, and theme tokens.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by any of REQ-1/REQ-2/REQ-3; only functional UI behavior and one new page/animation were requested.
